sentences.en: ( Permitting a call while other data is being accessed is a preferable alternative. )
sentences.cn: 通话结束后,要能够返回到以前的模式 ( 在访问其他数据时,仍然可以允许电话进来则是更好的一种可选方案 ).

sentences.en: Antimonial lead is preferable to chemical lead because of its greater corrosion resistance and strength.
sentences.cn: 含锑的铅较化工铅好些,由于它有更好的抗蚀性及强度.

sentences.en: Any principle is preferable to none.
sentences.cn: 任何原则都比没原则好.

sentences.en: Anything was preferable to that dreadful din in the house.
sentences.cn: 这屋子里乱七八糟的声音叫人难受得无以复加.

sentences.en: Anything was preferable to the tense atmosphere at home.
sentences.cn: 什么都比家里的紧张气氛好。

sentences.en: Death was considered vastly preferable to dishonor.
Death was considered vastly preferable to dishonour.
For most soybean growers it is preferable to have rows wide enough to permit mechanical cultivation.
sentences.cn: 对于大多数大豆栽培者来说,最好有足以允许机械耕种的行距.

sentences.en: For this dish, fresh herbs and garlic are preferable.
sentences.cn: 做这道菜，用新鲜香草和大蒜更好。

sentences.en: Given abundance attention, the leaves have to HAs grown preferable.
sentences.cn: 假如对这一些树多关心一部份,它们本来会长得更好.

sentences.en: Health without riches is preferable to riches without health.
sentences.cn: 有健康而无财富比有财富而无健康更好.

sentences.en: High temperature of the reburning zone is preferable to NO reduction.
sentences.cn: 还原区温度的升高有利于气化气对NO的还原.

sentences.en: In warm weather, clothes made of natural fabrics are infinitely preferable (= much better ) .
sentences.cn: 天气暖和的时候，穿天然织物的衣服要舒适得多。

sentences.en: Poverty is preferable to ill - health.
Respect the local etiquete. Modest clothing is often preferable to revealing shorts and tight-fitting tops.
sentences.cn: 要尊重当地的礼节。朴素端庄的衣着往往比暴露的短裤和紧身上衣更合适。

sentences.en: The hazards of the theatre seemed preferable to joining the family paint business.
sentences.cn: 经营剧院的风险似乎比加入家族涂料产业的风险要小一些。

sentences.en: Then lice and slops are preferable to my conversation?
sentences.cn: 那么你宁愿去跟虱子和脏水打交道,不想跟我交谈了?

words.tran_cn: 较好的,较合人意的;选好的

trans.tran_cn: 更好的，更可取的，略胜一筹的
